Day by day Celina works as a housekeeper.  She works around 9 hours a day and with the fruit of her labor she is able to help her parents.  Celina believes that she is getting ahead because she is responsible and honest.

Celina is very grateful for the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help that they have offered she will be able to buy a gas stove, since currently her stove runs on kerosene and a few days ago she had a small accident. Thanks to God it wasn't a big accident, but it is because of this that with this great support she will be able to improve the quality of life of her family and continue fighting to be able to make her biggest dream reality: "To have her own home and be able to study in the university."

loans.use: to buy a stove

loans.name: Selvín

texts.es:
Selvin tiene 33 años de edad, es casado y tiene un hijo.  El trabaja como albañil, agricultor, soldador, entre otros oficios, los desempeña desde los 18 años de edad, pues su padre fue quien le enseño. También, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, esto lo aprendió trabajando en una hacienda; pero el trabajo que mas disfruta y desempeña es el de las estructuras metálicas.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar un taladro, compresor, esmeril; ya que los que tiene no están en muy buen estado y para preparar la tierra para sembrar y pagar mano de obra.  Él desea invertir en este negocio, ya que es el que mayores ingresos le genera. Él quiere comprar un vehiculo para uso propio.
texts.en:
Selvin is 33 years old. He's married and has a son. He works as a bricklayer, a farmer and a welder, among other trades. He has been in these lines of work ever since he was 18 years old and he learned them from his father. He also raises cattle, which he learned by working in a farm. However, the kind of work that he does and enjoys the most is the one involving metal structures.

The loan he's requesting from Fundación Campo is to purchase a drill, a compressor and an emery, since the ones that he has now aren't in very good condition. He'll also prepare the land for sowing and pay for labor. He wishes to invest in this business, because it's the one that generates the biggest profits for him. He wishes to purchase a vehicle for his personal use.

loans.use: to purchase a drill, a compressor and an emery, to prepare the land for sowing and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Muhabatjon

texts.ru:
Мухабатджон 58 лет. Она проживает со своей семьей в Б.Гафуровском районе города Худжанд. В данный момент ее старший сын и невестка находятся на заработках в России. 
У Мухабатджон среднее техническое образование, но по специальности она никогда не работала. Вот уже 38 лет как Мухабатджон занимается животноводством и является опытным скотоводом. Она запрашивает кредит для закупа крупно-рогатого скота с целью расширения своей деятельности.
texts.en: Muhabatjon is 58 years old and she lives with her family in the B. Gafurovski region of Khujand.  Her elder son and his wife are currently working in Russia.  Muhabatjon has a secondary technical education, but has never worked in the field she studied.  For 38 years now, she has been involved in raising cattle and she is very experienced in this sphere.  She is asking for a loan to buy cows with the goal of expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy cows so she can expand her business.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
Esteban tiene 46 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijas. Actualmente, vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijas en una casa alquilada.  Las hijas son mayores de edad, y uno de ellas esta desempleada. Esteban es albañil, desde hace unos 20 años, posee una gran experiencia en ese rubro, también se dedica a la crianza de  pollos de engorde para luego venderlos, en esta actividad lleva un año desempeñándola. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar 720 pollos de engorde y 50 gallinas ponedoras. Con la inversión, podrá emplear a su hija que no tiene trabajo para que administre la granja y obtendrá ingresos necesarios para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y poder comprar su casa, brindar educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Esteban is 46. He is married and has three children. He currently lives with his wife and three daughters in a rented house. His daughters are all adults, one of whom is currently unemployed. Esteban has been a construction worker for more than 20 years. He has a broad experience in that sector. He also raises broiler chickens. He has been doing this for one year.  

Esteban is asking for a loan at Fundación Campo to purchase 720 broilers and 50 laying hens. With this investment he will be able to employ his daughter that is currently unemployed. She would manage the farm and thus generate enough income to improve the quality of life of her family, purchase their own home and provide her children with education.

loans.use: para comprar 720 pollos de engorde y 50 gallinas ponedoras.

loans.name: Progresando En Valores 1, 2 & 3 Group

texts.en:
Ysabel is the coordinator of her group, Progresando en Valores 1, 2 & 3 (Progress in Values). Her group is located in Samana, a lush, rugged peninsula with a nascent tourism industry. She makes her home in a simple structure, with her long-term partner and four children. 

Ysabel is excited to be taking her sixth loan with Esperanza International Dominican Republic. She has had her business, which she started with some savings, for around six years. She plans to use this loan to increase her inventory, by buying men's and women's clothes. She will use the profits to continue building her house. 

Ysabel says that her most difficult challenge is to finish building her house. In the meantime, she continues to enjoy sewing. Her dreams are to work hard and move her business forward and, with the help of God, she will. She thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy men's and women's clothes for resale.

loans.name: Teresa Del Milagro

texts.es:
Teresa tiene 42 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Guadalupe, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido así como también su agricultura y generosidad y alegría de su gente. Teresa es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque es madre soltera y saca adelante a sus 3 hijos de 14,10 y 4 años de edad, para Teresa sus hijos son el regalo mas grande que Dios le ha podido dar y sobre todo que son su motor para poder seguir luchando cada día a pesar de las adversidades que se le presentan; Teresa solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria, debido a que sus padres tenían pocos recursos económicos, pero le hubiera gustado mucho estudiar medicina.

Día a día Teresa trabaja como empleada por las mañanas, ya que en las tardes ella vende productos como tamales, huevos sancochados, choclo con queso, entre  otros, ella recorre las calles de su barrio en una especie de tricilo, con lo cual tiene un ingreso mas para poder sacar adelante a su familia, ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y tiene muchas ganas de progresar.

Teresa está muy agradecida con el apoyo que le están brindando los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a esta ayuda podrá comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, ladrillos, entre otros, con lo cual podrá construir un espacio para su negocio y mejorar la atención a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá poder seguir luchando para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en:
Teresa is 42 years old and lives in the city of Guadalupe which is well known for its warm climate, agriculture and the generosity and happy nature of its people. Teresa is a very hard working woman, above all because she is a single mother and is getting her three children, aged 4, 10 and 14, ahead. For Teresa, her children are the best gift that God has been able to give her and are her reason for continuing to fight everyday despite the adversity that she faces. Teresa was only able to study up to the fifth grade of secondary school because her parents had minimum economic resources. She would have liked to have studied medicine. 

Day to day, Teresa works as an employee in the mornings and in the afternoons she sells her goods including tamales, parboiled eggs, corn and cheese, and other items. She passes through the streets of her neighborhood on a tricycle, so that she can have an extra source of income to move her family forward. She belives that she is getting ahead because she is responsible and has a strong desire to improve. 

Teresa is very thankful for the support that Kiva lenders are bringing to her because thanks to this help she will be able to buy construction materials including cement, sand, bricks and other items. With these materials she will be able to build a business space and improve her customer service, allowing her to continue fighting to make her most sought after dream come true--to give her children the chance to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Donitila

texts.es: Donitila, tiene 53 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en una colonia suburbana de San Pedro Sula. Ella lleva 6 años de tener su propio taller de zapatería donde confecciona zapatos para damas caballeros y niños de diferentes tipos de calzado. Además hace reparaciones de calzado y sandalias. Ella vende en su casa por pedidos y también sale a vender a las ferias a nivel local y nacional. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo de 15,000 Lempiras para comprar materia prima, como ser suela, cuero, hilos, pegamento y otros que necesita para la confección de calzado que le han pedido. Con esta inversión espera mejorar sus ingresos y cumplir con ODEF y Kiva, a quienes le agradece por el apoyo que le están brindando. Su plan es lograr tener una franquicia junto con su hermano en otro sector, para ir creciendo poco a poco.
texts.en:
Donitila, age 53, is married and has two children.  She lives in a suburban neighborhood of San Pedro Sula.  She has had her own shoe shop for six years.  She makes different types of shoes for men, women, and children.  She also repairs shoes and sandals.  She sells by order from her house.  She also goes to sell at the local and national fairs.

She has decided to request a loan for 15,000 lempiras to buy raw material.  She will buy things like soles, leather, thread, glue, and other things she needs to make the shoes that have been ordered.

With this investment she hopes to improve her income and fulfill her commitment with ODEF and Kiva.  She is grateful for the support they have given her.  

Her plan is to manage to have a franchise with her brother in another area and to continue growing little by little.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like soles, leather, thread, and glue to make shoes.

loans.name: Dilnaz

texts.ru: Дилназе 28 лет, замужем,  у них с мужем двое детей,Обы сына школьного возраста . Дилназ в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении 5 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 3,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Дилназ в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 3 бычка, перепродажа скота на местном рынке приносит около 12,000 сом в месяц. Также, Дилназ возделывает 0,66 га земли с фасолью и эспарцетом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Дилназ обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку двух бычков для отправки на летнее пастбище. Доходы от кредита Дилназ будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса, в будущем планирует дать образование своим детям.
texts.en: Dilnaz is 28 years old, married, and has 2 school-aged sons. As the main breadwinner of the family, for the last 5 years Dilnaz has been working in the field of animal husbandry, having started this business with a sum of only 3,000 Kyrgyzstan Som. Thanks to her persistent hard work, her farm now includes 3 bulls, and her income from re-selling cattle on the market is around 12,000 Som per month. In addition, she cultivates a plot of land of 0.66 hectares where she grows beans and the legume sainfoin. For the purpose of further developing her business, Dilnaz has now approached Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 80,000 Som to buy 2 bulls so she can pasture them over the summer. he will use the income generated by this loan to re-invest in her business, and in the future she plans to give her children a good education.

loans.use: To purchase two bulls

loans.name: Heydi Patricia

texts.es: Heydi de 36 años, es madre soltera viuda para ella fue una situación muy difícil que le ha tocado vivir con su única hija de 2 años, pero como toda una mujer optimista sale adelante, es licenciada en agro negocios, por la falta de empleo en el país se ha dedicado al negocio de venta de lubricantes y auto lavado lo que le ha ayudado a cubrir sus gastos y el de las personas que le trabajan como ayudante, para Heydi este negocio es la base de su vida económica, a  sus  clientes les gusta el buen servicio que les ofrece ya que cuidan de su  vehículo y motor, su deseo para el futuro es tener una tienda de ropa intima para mujeres y vender perfumes. Con el crédito solicitado comprara cajas de aceite para vehículos, líquido de freno, artículos para el lavado de vehículo entre otros.
texts.en: Heydi is 36 years old.  She’s a widow and a single mother and the situation has been difficult for her and her two year old daughter, but as an optimistic woman she manages to get ahead.  She is an Agro-lawyer, but due to lack of opportunity in her country, she has dedicated herself to selling lubricants and running a car wash in order to cover her expenses and those of those who work for her.  For Heydi, this business is the basis for her finances.  Her customers like the good service she provides because they care for the vehicle and it’s engine.  Her desire for the future is to have an intimate apparel store for women and sell perfumes.  She will use the money from this loan to buy cases of motor oil, brake fluid, and items for the car wash, among other things.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina tiene 27 años, es soltera y madre de 2 pequeños niños , a su vez cuenta con una casa propia en donde ha colocdado una vitrina de exhibición que le permite mostrar su mercaderia ya que el trabajo de Karina consiste en la venta de cosméticos y productos de perfumería como talcos, desodorantes, perfumes, colonias entre otros. Sus clientes se encuentran distribuidos por diversas calles de la ciudad, siendo estos en su mayoria familiares , vecinos y amigos . Karina trabaja bajo el sistema de venta crediticia y cumple esta función desde hace 4 años.Le gusta su trabajo pues le permite estar en constante actividad durante el día y asi generar sus propios ingresos, ella  espera seguir trabajando de esta manera  para que en un futuro pueda  establecer una tienda de abarrotes en su hogar. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 600 para la compra de cosméticos tales como sombras , cremas corporales , talcos entre otros y a su vez se compromete a ser muy puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Karina, 27, is single and the mother of two small children.  She also has her own house where she has set up a display case to show her merchandise.  Karina's job is selling cosmetics and perfume products such as talcum powder, deodorant, perfume, cologne, and other things.

Her customers are located on different streets throughout the city and are mainly family members, neighbors, and friends.  Karina has worked under a system of credit for four years.  

She likes her job because it allows her to be constantly active during the day and generate her own income.  She hopes to continue working this way so she can set up a grocery store in her house in the future.

This time she'll request 600 soles [PEN] to buy cosmetics such as eye shadow, body lotion, talcum powder, and others.  She promises to make her loan payments very punctually.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.en:
Vicenta is one of the members with a housing loan from the city of Samana. This is her 13th loan, which she will use to improve her house. She has had her food-selling business for over eight years, starting with her own capital. With her last loan, she invested in her business, where she sells fried food. 

Esperanza International Dominican Republic runs a program for their good clients who are reliable in paying back their loans, who have fulfilled the commitment to grow their businesses and who have shown fidelity in their groups. This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time running their business and attending their group meetings.

Vicenta is the mother of five children and they live together with her and her long-term partner. She works and lives in a rural town in Samana. She will use this loan to buy cement, concrete blocks and other construction materials to change the wood walls in her house to concrete blocks. She thanks God, Esperanza International Dominican Republic and all of you for this opportunity. In her name and that of her family, she thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy concrete blocks and cement

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is a member of the group called Nuevo Progreso 4 (New Progress 4), located in the city of Samana. This is his seventh loan, which he will use to improve his house. He has had his business for over six years, started from his savings.

After his last loan, which he invested in his business, Jose realised the need to build his home's roof.  With this housing loan he is able to take, and with his business profits, he can pay for it and save for more home improvements. The other members of his group are recommending him for a housing loan to start with the house construction. Now he will build this house roof and make other change like floors, etc.

Esperanza Internacional runs a programme for their good clients who are reliable in paying back their loans, who have fulfilled the commitment to grow their business and who have shown fidelity in their groups. This allows them to take out a loan to improve the structure of their house at the same time as running their business and attending their group meetings. 

Jose lives together with his long term partner, who is also the mother of his 3 children. He is also a micro-entrepreneur conducting fish sales. He thanks God, Esperanza Internacional and all of you for this opportunity. In his name and that of his family, he thanks all of you for your support!

loans.use: to buy building materials for his house roof

loans.name: San Ramon Solidarity Group

texts.es: El Grupo San Ramón conformado por dos miembros los cuales son Delmi Raquel Y Martha Lorena ambas solteras ellas pertenecen al departamento de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país la cual es una zona muy comercial y existe gran demanda. Delmi tiene dos hijos 3 y 7 años ambos estudian, ella inicia su negocio con la ayuda de su mama quien siempre la ha apoyado y como salió la oportunidad de vender en una cuadrilla del ingenio decide aventurarse sola y gracias a dios le ha ido bien hasta la fecha, Martha tiene cinco hijos de 24,29,30,31 y 34 años de edad todos trabajan, ella inicia su negocio buscando un medio de subsistencia debido a que sus hijos estaban estudiando ella era madre y padre a la misma vez para ellos primeramente comienza con la venta de refrescos y enchiladas en los buses, pero después comenzó a llevar comida y de esa manera fue haciendo clientela hoy en día su negocio es su mayor fuente de empleo ambas tienen más de 10 años de tener este negocio. Ellas  están solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, frijoles, aceite, platos desechables, refrescos, azúcar, café, entre otros. El Grupo San Ramón agradece la ayuda que los inversionistas Kiva les brindan a personas de escasos recursos y países pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en: The San Ramón group consists of two members, Delmi Raquel and Martha Lorena. Both are single. They are from the department of Chinandega, which is located in the western part of the country, which is a very commercial area with a lot of activity. Delmi has two children, ages 3 and 7, both of whom are in school. She began her business with the help of her mother, who has always supported her, and as the opportunity arose to sell to sugar mill workers, she decided to set out on her own, and, thanks to God, it has gone well for her so far. Martha has five children, ages 24, 29, 30, 31, and 34, all of whom are working. She began her business looking for a means of subsistence because her children were in school. She was both mother and father at the same time for them. First she began with the sale of soft drinks and enchiladas on buses, but later she began to prepare meals, and in this way she began to acquire customers. Now her business is her main source of employment. Each has had her business for more than 10 years. They are applying for the loan to buy rice, beans, oil, disposable plates, soft drinks, sugar, coffee, and other items. The San Ramón group is grateful for the help that the Kiva investors offer to people of scarce resources and poor countries such as Nicaragua to have a means of dignified work.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, disposable plates, soft drinks, sugar, coffee, and other products

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase inventory for his wholesale bakery company

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase equipment to expand their business

loans.name: Enkhbat

texts.en: Mr. Enkhbat, a 33-year-old man, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in his brother’s house on plot of land. He has been rendering a tire repair service since 2005. With just 2000000 MNT, he began his tire repair service and over the years he has accumulated vast amount of experience. His seven-year-old son goes to elementary school and now is in second grade. His wife is unemployed and now stays at home to care for their younger child. He has got loan from our organization five times and paid each loan on established schedules without delay. He is requesting a loan of 500000 MNT to purchase spare parts and tools in large quantity. As a result, he can run his tire repair business without worrying about inventory shortage.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and tools

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
La señora  Mirian tiene 23 años, tiene  2 hijos,  es madre soltera, reside junto a sus hijos  en una comunidad del   Municipio de Tela, departamento de Atlántida.
Desde hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, además vende cosméticos.
Actualmente ha solicitado un préstamo por la cantidad de 13 ,000 Lempiras, los que piensa invertir en la compra de ropa de temporada de verano, cremas, lociones, bloqueadores solares y acondicionadores.
Mirian espera aprovechar la temporada de verano para incrementar sus ventas y sus ingresos que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida y brindarles educación escolar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sra. Mirian is 23 years old and a single mother with two children. She and her children reside in a community in the town of Tela in the Department of Atlántida.

For the past three years, Mirian has been selling clothes for women, men, and children. She also sells cosmetics. At the moment, she is requesting a loan in the amount of 13,000 HNL which she plans to invest in the purchase of summer clothing, crèmes, lotions, sunscreen, and conditioners.

Mirian hopes to take advantage of the summer season to increase her sales and her earnings. This will enable her to improve her quality of life and provide an education for her children.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing, crèmes, lotions, sunscreen, and conditioners.

loans.name: Mohira

texts.ru: Мохире 20 лет. Она не замужем и живет с родителями. Мохира обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она хочет организовать свой бизнес. Она нуждается в источнике дохода, так как доход ее отца от выращивания сельхоз культур маленький. Недавно в семье они проводили мероприятие и затратили все сбережения. Данное время у них очень тяжелое условие проживания и поэтому она очень нуждается поддержки. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 850 долларов США для покупки скота, чтобы организовать свой бизнес. Она имеет опыт выращиванию скота и считает, что это не убыточный бизнес, так как скот имеет большой спрос на местном рынке. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mohira is 20 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She took a course entitled "Get Ahead" organised by the Association of Businesswomen and for which she received a certificate. Now she wants to set up her own business. She needs a source of income because the earnings of her father, who grows crops for a living, are very small. The family recently hosted a celebration and their savings were depleted. They are currently facing very difficult living conditions, which is why Mohira really needs support. She is seeking a loan of 850 US dollars to buy cattle so she can start her own business. She has experience raising cattle and considers this field to be a profitable one to get into, since there is a great demand for cattle on the local market. Mohira is waiting for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy cattle to start a new business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy legal stationery and notary certificates and to pay for filing fees.

loans.name: Sojida

texts.ru: Трудное условие жизни заставляет человека направлять все свои усилия и мотивировать существующие ресурсы. Соджида является одним из таких личностей, которая старается улучшить условия жизни и стимулировать экономическое состояние семьи. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 4 детей. Ее муж занимается земледелием  и его доход не хватает для обеспечения семьи со всеми необходимыми средствами. Соджида решила помочь мужу для благо получения семьи. С такой целью она обучилась в курсе «Добейся успеха» организованный Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и получила сертификат. Теперь она вполне может организовать свой бизнес и стать успешной в этой сфере. Она хочет организовать бизнес  купле продажей   скота, так как имеет опыт в этом виде бизнеса. От полученного дохода она планирует обеспечить своих детей с хорошим образованием и высококалорийными продуктами питания. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1300 долларов США  для покупки скота, чтобы организовать новый бизнес. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Difficult life circumstances force people to channel their efforts and galvanize their existing resources. Sojida is one such person who is trying to improve her standard of living and jumpstart the economic situation of her family. She is married and has 4 children at home. Her husband works in farming but his income is not sufficient to provide his family with all their necessities. Sojida has decided to help her husband for the welfare of the family. For this reason, she took a course entitled "Get Ahead" organised by the Association of Businesswomen, and for which she received a certificate. She wants to set up her own business buying and re-selling cattle because she has experience in this area. She plans to use the income generated by this loan to give her children a good education and nutritious food. Sojida is seeking a loan of 1,300 US dollars to buy cattle to establish her new business. She is waiting for your kind assistance.

loans.use: To buy cattle to start a new business

loans.name: Calixto

texts.es: Calixto, tiene 43 años de edad, casado, tiene dos hijos, vive en una aldea del municipio de Taulabe, Comayagua. Don Calixto tiene 10 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, el cultiva café y lo vende en pergamino y por latas en el mercado local.  El ha mantenido su finca en buen estado mediante la inversión de varios prestamos con ODEF, el préstamo que solicita actualmente es el numero 15 y es por 3,000 Lempiras, el cual  lo  invertirá  en la compra de abono y pago de limpieza a la finca de café. Todos los préstamos le han ayudado a mantener buenas cosechas, al igual que esta inversión le ayudara a  incrementar mas la producción en la próxima cosecha. Su plan es terminar de educar a sus últimos dos hijos que tiene en casa.
texts.en:
Calixto is 43 years old, married, and has two children. He lives in a neighborhood in the town of Taulabe, Comayagua.

Don Calixto has been a farmer for 10 years. He grows coffee and sells it in cans with its parchment at the local market. Calixto has been able to keep his farm in good condition by investing several loans from ODEF. The loan he is currently requesting is his 15th transaction and amounts to 3,000 HNL. He will invest it in the purchase of compost and will also pay for labor to have his coffee farm cleared. All of his loans have helped him to maintain a good crop as well as increase his production for the next season. His plan is to see his two children, who are living at home, finish their education.

loans.use: to buy compost and pay for labor to clear his coffee farm.

loans.name: Mutabarhon

texts.ru:
Мутабархон жительница города Истаравшан. Ей 28 лет. Она живет с мужем. У них один ребёнок. Она добрая, отзывчивая женщина. У Мутабархон среднее образование. 
Вместе с мужем Мутабархон занимается животноводством. Она берет кредит для закупа коров и телят, чтобы увеличить поголовья крупнорогатого скота и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Mutabarhon lives in the town of Istaravshan. She is 28 years old. She lives together with her husband. They have one  child. She is a kind and thoughtful woman. Mutabarhon has received secondary education. Together with her husband, she raises livestock. She is taking out a loan to buy cows and calves in order to increase her cattle head count and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy cows and calves in order to increase her cattle head count and expand her business.

loans.name: Amada Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Sra. Amada vive en Libertad, tiene 35 años de edad. Tiene un negocio en donde vende productos AVON, el trabajo lo realiza con su hija todo el día. En este negocio lo que mas vende son maquillaje, cremas, perfumes, etc.

Es una persona enferma, pero su hija conoce a los clientes a quienes les vende los productos así que cuando la clienta se enferma la hija le ayuda a poder cobrar el dinero a los clientes.

Está casada, tiene una hija que estudia en un colegio fiscal y su esposo que es pescador quien le ayuda en los gastos de la casa, para así juntos salir adelante.

Con el prestamo quiere comprar maquillaje, cremas, perfumes.  El sueño que tiene con este préstamo es que su negocio se mantenga porque le gusta vender todo lo que está relacionado con maquillaje y bisutería.
texts.en:
Amada, 35, lives in Libertad.  She has a business where she sells AVON products.  She works with her daughter every day.  What she sells the most in her business is make-up, creams, perfume, etc.  

She’s not in good health but her daughter knows the customers she sells her products to so whenever she’s not well her daughter helps her collect payments from her customers.  She’s married and has a daughter attending public school; her husband’s a fisherman who helps her with the household expenses so they can get ahead together.  

She intends to use the loan to buy make-up, creams and perfume.  The dream she has with this loan is to stay in business because she likes selling everything related to make-up and costume jewelry.

loans.use: to buy make-up, creams and perfume.

loans.name: Marie Claire

texts.fr: Marie Claire est une jeune camerounaise âgée de 28 ans qui mène comme activité la vente de boisson dans un quartier de la ville depuis 02 ans. le stock de boisson dont elle dispose en permanence ne lui permet pas de satisfaire convenablement sa clientèle. elle voudrait ainsi avec ce crédit acheter de la boisson pour renforcer son stock, ce qui va augmenter ses ventes et par conséquent son bénéfice. ce qui lui permettra de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Marie Claire is a young woman from Cameroon.  She is 28 years old and, for the past two years, she has been selling drinks in one of her town's neighborhoods.  However, her stock of drinks does not allow her to adequately meet her customers' needs.  This is why she intends to use her loan to buy some drinks in order to boost her stock and increase her sales and profits.  This will allow Marie Claire to better meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy drinks.

loans.name: Bineta

texts.fr: Bineta est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de trois enfants. Elle exerce un commerce de produits alimentaires au marché de sa localité. Ce commerce lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 150 000f pour acheter des produits alimentaires.
texts.en: Bineta is a married woman. She is the mother of three children. She sells food products at the local market. This business allows her to provide for herself and her children. In order to bolster her working capital, she is seeking a loan of 150,000 West African franks to buy food products.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Jesenia Esmit

texts.es:
Jesenia es una joven madre de 29 años de edad, su pequeña tiene 1 añito de edad y por ella Jesenia daría la vida con tal de verla feliz y sobre todo que tenga mejores oportunidades que las que Jesenia tuvo, por ello le brinda todo su amor y su lucha diaria. La vivienda donde habita Jesenia se ubica en la ciudad de Pucallpa, la cual es una ciudad que se encuentra ubicada en la selva peruana, en la cual podemos apreciar paisajes hermosos y fauna variada. Jesenia trabaja desde muy joven y gracias a su esfuerzo logro estudiar carrera de turismo, pero debido a que no encontraba empleo logro con mucho esfuerzo iniciar su negocio de servicio de costura y confección de prendas y con ello puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es muy amable con los clientes y realiza su trabajo con mucho cuidado y dedicación.

Jesenia está muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le están brindando podrá comprar una maquina remalladora y telas al por mayor para poder atender los pedidos de uniformes escolares de sus clientes, de esta manera podrá tener los materiales necesarios y mejorar sus ingresos, así ella seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una buena educación a su hija”.
texts.en:
Jesenia is a young mother of 29 years of age. Her little one is 1 year old and it is for her that Jesenia would give her life to see her happy, and above all to see her have better opportunities than those that Jesenia had. It is for her that Jesenia dedicates all her love and her daily struggle.

Jesenia's home is located in the city of Pucallpa, which is a city in the Peruvian jungle, where one can appreciate beautiful landscapes and diverse fauna.

Jesenia has been working since she was very young, and thanks to her hard work she was able to study tourism. However, because she could not find employment she was able with much effort to start her own business dedicated to the sewing and manufacture of garments. Through this work she is able, with much care, to cover the costs of her home. Jesenia believes that she is doing well because she is very kind to her customers and completes her work with a lot of care and dedication. 

Jesenia is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since the support they are offering her will enable her to buy a darning machine and wholesale fabrics in order to attend to her customer's orders for school uniforms. In this way, she will be able to have all the necessary materials and improve her income. This will allow her to continue striving to realize her greatest dream: "to give her daughter a good education."

loans.use: to buy a darning machine and wholesale fabrics

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy five bags of rice, three bags of sugar and three cans of oil.

loans.name: Uktam

texts.ru: Уктам проживает в районе Спитамен. Ему 38 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Жена Уктама работает учительницей в средней школе. Сам Уктам занимается купле-продажей крупно-рогатого скота. Он занимается этим видом деятельности более 10 лет. В этом бизнесе ему помогает семья. Еще он имеет доход от продажи молока от дойных коров. Дополнительно семья Уктама занимается выращиванием селхозкультур на арендуемых землях. Чтобы расширить свой бизнес Уктам обратился за кредитом для закупа скота и в дальнейшем его откорма и перепродажи.
texts.en: Uktam lives in the Spitamen Region. He is 38 years old. He is married and has three children. His wife is a secondary school teacher. Uktam buys and resells cattle. He has been in this business for over 10 years. His family helps him out in the business. He earns an additional income by selling milk of his dairy cows. In addition, Uktam’s family grows produce on leased land plots. In order to expand his business, Uktam has applied for a loan to buy cattle for fattening and later resale.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is married with 5 children. Merlyn is 44 years old and lives in Pan-ay, Clarin, Philippines.

Merlyn is a farmer and grows fruit and vegetable crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan to purchase additional fertilizer for her garden. 

Merlyn has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Merlyn hopes to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizer for her garden

loans.name: Mary Alice

texts.en:
Mary Alice is 41 years old and married with two children who are in school. Mary Alice works very hard to provide for them.

Mary Alice runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell, such as canned goods, frozen products, spices, soap, etc.

Mary Alice has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Mary Alice would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell, such as canned goods, frozen products, spices, soap, etc.

loans.name: Rosalita

texts.en:
Rosalita is married with 3 children. Rosalita is 54 years old and lives in Maribijoc, Tudela, Mis.Occ., Philippines.

Rosalita is a farmer and produces corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan to purchase additional fertilizer for her corn production. 

Rosalita has been a member of PMPC for 7 years. In the future, Rosalita hopes to supplement her family income.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizer for corn production

loans.name: Empenita

texts.en:
Empenita is married with 4 children. Empenita is 60 years old and lives in Pan-ay, Clarin, Philippines.

Empenita is a farmer and grows coconuts to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years. Empenita has requested a loan to purchase additional fertilizer.

Empenita has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Empenita hopes to save in case of emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizer

loans.name: Nellie

texts.en:
Nellie is 64 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo, Sinacaban, Philippines. Nellie is married with 4 children. 

Nellie has a sari-sari (general) store business and earns approximately PHP 1,800 each month doing this type of work. Nellie has requested a loan to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, etc.

Nellie has been a member of PMPC for 7 years. In the future, Nellie hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 47 years-old, married and has two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Elisa has a business making foam beds in the Philippines. Elisa requested a loan of 40,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy raw materials to make foam beds.

Elisa has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Elisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her business.

loans.name: Mirgul

texts.ru: Миргул 39 лет, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Миргул на протяжении 18 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с мужем сразу после свадьбы. Благодаря упорному труду Миргул в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется очень развитое хозяйство, продажа молока и молочных продуктов составляет 15,000 сом в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Миргул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для последующей перепродажи. Доходы от кредита Миргул планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Mirgul is 39 years old, married, with four children. Mirgul has been raising livestock for 18 years, having launched this business soon after getting married. Thanks to Mirgul’s hard work, her farm today is really well developed; sales of milk and dairy products amount to about 15,000 KGS per month. In order to continue growing her business, Mirgul has applied to “Bai Tushum & Partners” for a loan in the amount of 130,000 KGS  to buy bulls for later resale. Mirgul plans to use the resulting revenues to increase her livestock further.

loans.use: to purchase 4 bulls for future resale.

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 62 years old, married, and has four children. With two children in school, Fe works very hard to provide for them.

Fe runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 21,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell such as canned goods, eggs, soft drinks, and other goods.

Fe has been in this business for ten years. In the future, Fe would like to save enough money so she that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Lydia works hard to support her family.

She has a business buying and selling charcoal in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Lydia is borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell for her charcoal business.

Lydia has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business and to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Kuña Rory Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnación, está en su ciclo número diez, y hay que destacar que todas ellas han trabajado mucho por salir adelante y tener de esa forma un mejor ingreso para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Catalina ella tiene 6 hijos,  está casada con el Sr. Roberto, ella se dedica hace varios años al corte y confección de todo tipo de trabajos, como ser prendas, sabanas, cortinados y demás. Cuenta la Sra. Catalina  que por medio de este trabajo ha dado a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una vida sin necesidades, y es por eso que solicita este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, botones, y demás, para poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con su trabajo.
texts.en:
This group from the city of Encarnación is in its tenth cycle, and it's important to emphasize that all of them have worked a lot to get ahead to have a better income to be able to help their families.

One of the group members is Catalina.  She has six children and is married to Roberto.  She has made a living for several years cutting and making all kinds of jobs, such as garments, sheets, curtains, and other things.  Catalina says that with this job she has given her family everything they need for a life without needs.

This is why she's requesting this loan to be able to invest in buying fabric, thread, buttons, and other things, so she can continue working and doing her job.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Las Perlas Del Sur Group

texts.es:
Con gran esfuerzo el Grupo La Perla del Sur, está en su ciclo doce, donde cada una de ellas está dando todo de sí para poder mejorar sus vidas y también la de sus familias.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Susana, ella tiene un comedor en el local de una empresa muy conocida de venta de autos, trabaja ahí deleitando a sus clientes con la variedad de comidas que hace. Le está yendo muy bien, ya que sus comidas son muy ricas y aceptadas por sus clientes. Gracias al trabajo que hace esta saliendo adelante y ayuda a su familia.
Cuenta la Sra. Susana que solicita de este crédito para la compra de carnes, verduras, condimentos, y demás insumos para poder seguir haciendo las comidas que vende y así seguir teniendo los medios para seguir luchando.
texts.en: With a lot of hard work the La Perla del Sur group is in its 12th loan cycle. Every one of the members is giving her all to be able to improve the lives of themselves and their families. One of the members is Susana, who has an eatery at a well-known local business that sells cars. She works there delighting her customers with the various foods she makes. The business is going very well, since her food is very tasty and draws rave review from her customers. Thanks to this work she is making headway and helping her family. Susana is requesting the loan to purchase meats, vegetables, condiments and other ingredients so she can keep making the foods she sells and continue having the means to keep fighting.

loans.use: to purchase meats, vegetables, condiments and other items.

loans.name: Magatte

texts.fr:
Magatte est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de deux enfants dont l'un est élève à l'école primaire. Elle fait un commerce de produits céréaliers en achetant notamment du mil en gros pour le revendre au détail.Ce commerce lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille ainsi qu'à ses propres besoins.
Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 200 000f pour acheter des sacs de mil.
texts.en: Magatte is married and the mother of two children, one of whom goes to primary school.  She sells grains, specifically millet, which she buys in bulk quantities before selling it for retail.  Thanks to this business, she makes quite a good income and is able to meet her needs as well as those of her family.  In order to strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs in order to buy some bags of millet.

loans.use: to buy bags of millet.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou works hard to support her family. She is married and has a variety store business in the Philippines.

Marilou has requested a loan of 18,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional groceries such as snack foods, canned goods, dried fish and school supplies.

She has been in this business for twelve years. In the future, Marilou would like to save enough to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries like snack foods, canned goods, dried fish and school supplies.

loans.name: 8 De Diciembre Group

texts.es:
El presente comité se encuentra, en su 7º.ciclo. Podemos decir que el grupo es muy responsable, todas las integrantes tienen actividades y están saliendo adelante gracias al trabajo que todas hacen, ya que son madres muy trabajadoras.
La Sra. Alejandra es una de las miembros, ella es una persona por sobre todo muy valiente y con ganas de progresar, su trabajo consiste en la recolección y compra – venta de artículos reciclados. Compra y los revende para poder tener mayor ganancia. Gracias a este trabajo esta saliendo adelante y da a su familia lo que necesitan. Esta orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo digno y por sobre todo honesto.
Pide este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de plásticos, botellas, bolsas, cartón, etc. Los cuales va a revender y tener un mejor margen de ganancia y así dar a su familia lo que puede dentro de sus posibilidades.
texts.en: This group is in its seventh loan cycle, and we can say that this group is very responsible. All of the members have businesses and are making headway thanks to all the effort they have put in as working mothers. Alejandra is a member of the group. She is above all very brave and eager to make progress. She makes a living collecting and buying/selling recyclables. She buys the items and then can sell them for a profit. Thanks to this work she is making headway and giving her family what it needs. She is proud of the work she does, since it is decent and, above all, honest work. She is requesting the loan to purchase plastics, bottles, bags, cardboard and other items to resell so she has a better profit margin and give her family what she can within her means.

loans.use: to purchase plastics, bottles, bags, cardboard and other items to resell.

loans.name: Cuenta Conmigo Group

texts.es:
El comité “Cuento Contigo” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de Santaní. Las integrantes formaron un grupo muy unido y capaz de realizar conjuntamente actividades que fortalecen su compañerismo, y de esa forma se ayudan a salir adelante.
Cristina, quien se dedica a la venta de prendas usadas, es parte de este grupo, y con su trabajo trata de salir adelante y ayudar a su familia. Ella es una persona que quiere salir adelante y es por eso que siempre se esfuerza mucho. Esta solicitando de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de segunda mano, ya que le está yendo muy bien.
texts.en:
The group  “Cuento Contigo” [ I Depend on You] was formed by various women neighbors in the city of Santaní. 

The members formed a very tight group who together do activities that strengthen their partnership and help each other to get ahead. 

Cristina, who sells second hand clothing, is part of this group. With her work she tries to get ahead and help her family. 

She is a person who wants to get ahead and always tries hard.

She is asking for this loan in order to invest it in buying second hand clothing since this is going very well for her.

loans.use: to buy second hand clothing to sell.

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
Bernadeth is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Bernadeth has been in this business for three years. She earns additional income by raising livestock.

Bernadeth has sustained her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza works hard to support her family. She is 25 years old and single. Riza has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Riza requested an 11,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

She has been in this business for two years now.

In the future, Riza would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Marangatu Rape Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Marangatu Rape está en su ciclo número 5º del programa de comité de mujeres. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6 personas se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, siendo su ingreso mucho menor, casi en la pobreza extrema.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Lidia, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, es decir por debajo de la línea de la pobreza. Ella está trabajando arduamente en la venta de prendas, ya que quiere poder mejorar su nivel de ingresos para poder darle una mayor ayuda a su familia y poder mejorar sus vidas. Gracias al apoyo que está recibiendo se ve muy esperanzada a seguir luchando por todo lo que sueña.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de prendas de todo tipo, con lo cual podrá seguir con sus ventas y procurar mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The Marangatu Rape group is in its fifth loan cycle. In a poverty-elimination survey, six of the members were below the poverty line, with an income much lower, almost in extreme poverty. One of the members is Lidia, who in her last survey was found to be below the poverty line. She is working arduously selling clothes, since she wants to be able to increase her income so she can better help her family and improve their lives. Thanks to the support she is receiving she is very hopeful about continuing to fight for her dreams. She is requesting the loan to purchase all kinds of clothes so she can continue with her sales and earn better income.

loans.use: to purchase clothes to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 54 years old and lives in Catadman, Ozamiz City. She is married with seven children.

Elizabeth is one of the most hardworking women in her area. She operates a small business in which she sells banana cue. She requested a loan to buy materials - bananas, sticks, and other items - for her small business.

She has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

Elizabeth is the leader of a two person group. Although they are borrowing as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to buy bananas to make and sell banana cue.

location.town: Ozamis-P9 Catadman, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidenta

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 67 years old and married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Dominga has a fishing business in the Philippines. Dominga requested a 16,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to buy additional materials for her fishing business like paint, bamboo, fishing net, etc.

Dominga has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Dominga would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her fishing business like paint, bamboo, fishing net, etc.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is single with two children. Teresita is 59 years old and lives in Libertad Bajo, Sinacaban, Philippines.

Teresita sells dried fish to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Teresita has requested a loan to purchase additional dried fish to sell.

Teresita has been a member of PMPC for seven years. In the future, Teresita hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional dried fish to sell.

loans.name: Daniel Jose

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven de 21 años de edad, el cual vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad cálida y acogedora con una agricultura variada y poseedora de atractivos turísticos como la laguna de Huacachina. Cada día Daniel se esfuerza mucho por salir adelante y apoyar a sus padres, es por ello que Daniel trabaja como vigilante, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al día y luego de culminada su labor diaria el va a su centro de estudios ya que se encuentra estudiando la carrera de computación e informática, el cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y sobre todo tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Daniel está muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le están brindando podrá comprar una computadora  para poder realizar sus prácticas estudiantiles, así poder tener las herramientas necesarias para poder seguir estudiando y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Terminar su carrera y poder tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Daniel is a 21 years old young adult who lives in the city of Ica, a warm and friendly city with varied agriculture and tourist attractions such as the lagoon of Huacachina. 

Every day, Daniel tries hard to get ahead and support his parents. This is the reason why Daniel works as a guard. He works about eight hours a day and after his daily work he goes to a study center because he is studying a computer science degree. He believes he is getting ahead because he is very responsible and above all, eager to get ahead.

Daniel is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they are providing, he will be able to buy a computer for his internship. With that, he will have all the necessary tools to keep studying and to strive to realize his biggest dream: "To finish his career and to have his own house".

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Edilma

texts.en:
Edilma is 64 years old and lives in Cabol-anonan, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She is divorced with six children.
 
To earn a living, Edilma has a business selling fish in the community. She earns about 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) each month doing this type of work. Edilma has requested a loan to purchase additional fish to sell.

Edilma has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Edilma would like to improve the family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: Desiree

texts.en:
Desiree is married with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Desiree is 32 years old and has four children who are in school.

Desiree has a repair shop business in the Philippines. Desiree requested a 20,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to purchase extra materials for her repair shop.

Desiree has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Desiree would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase extra materials for her repair shop.

loans.name: Arcelie

texts.en:
Arcelie is 53 years old and is married with two children. To generate income, she has been engaged in a hog-raising business for five years and usually earns about 2,500 PHP (Philippines pesos) with each piglet she sells. 

Arcelie wants to lift her children out of poverty; that's why she works hard. At this moment, she needs more capital. In this regard, she is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 5,000 to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for the proper growth of her hogs.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for the proper growth of her hogs.

loans.name: Indatwa Group

texts.fr:
Claudine fait partie du groupe Indatwa et  habite à Bujumbura. Elle a 32 ans et est mariée à Emmanuel, un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont  6 enfants, âgés de  4 à 15 ans,  dont 5 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce  de patate douce, de manioc, de haricot, depuis 12 ans. 

Elle est à son deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter un sac supplémentaire de patates douces. Tous ses produits vivriers(patate douce, manioc, haricot, ...) seront revendus, pour gagner plus.

Dans les prochaines  années, elle  voudrait faire le commerce de chèvres et  satisfaire convenablement les besoins familiaux de ses enfants (alimentation, habillement,). Elle voudrait en outre  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Claudine is part of the group Indatwa and lives in Bujumbura. She is 32 years old and married to Emmanuel, a farmer. Together they have six children, from 4 to 15 years old, of whom five are students. 

She has been doing commerce in sweet potatoes, cassava, and beans for twelve years. 

She is on her second Turame loan. With the KIVA loan she is obtaining, she is going to increase her capital and purchase an additional sack of sweet potatoes. All of her staple products (sweet potatoes, cassava, beans,..) will be sold, so as to earn more.

In the coming years, she would like to do commerce in goats and to meet in a suitable manner the family needs of her children (food, clothing).  Besides this, she would like to see her children go to school.

loans.use: to purchase an additional sack of sweet potatoes to sell

loans.name: Yacine

texts.fr: Yacine est une femme mariée.Elle achète et vend des tissus et articles de mercerie qu'elle place auprès de ses clients avant de les récupérer au bout de quelques mois. Ce commerce lui permet de prendre en charge ses propres besoins ainsi que ceux de ses trois enfants. Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce , elle sollicite un pret de 250 000f pour acheter des tissus.
texts.en: Yacine is a married woman. She purchases cloth and sewing supplies for hers customers and then collects payments after a few months. This business enables her to meet her own needs, as well as those of her three children. To bolster her working capital, she is requesting a loan of 250,000 francs to purchase some cloth.

loans.use: to purchase cloth

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn works hard to support her family. Jenelyn is married and has a ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines.

Jenelyn requested a 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy additional stock like shorts, t-shirts, blouses, etc.

Jenelyn has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Jenelyn would like to save enough money so she can finish the college education of her children.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks like shorts, t-shirts, blouses, etc.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is single. Jocelyn is 44 years old and lives in Masabod, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines.

Jocelyn sells cellphone load credits to earn a living and has had this business for two years. Each month, Jocelyn earns 1,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) doing this type of work. Jocelyn has requested a loan for 10,000 PHP to purchase additional load credits for her business.

Jocelyn has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Jocelyn hope to save to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional cellphone load credits.

loans.name: Rambha Devi

texts.en:
Rambha Devi is a 35-year-old married woman from the Balirampur Village Development Committee of Bara District. She is a hardworking woman and has one child. 

For the past three years, she has been selling different types of fertilizer in her village. She has a good customer base. She buys fertilizer from big vendors at a low price and sells it to fellow farming villagers. 

She has requested a loan of 40,000 NPR (Nepal rupees) to buy more fertilizer for her inventory so that she can meet the increasing demand of the customers at the right time. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to sell to village farmers.

loans.name: Gyanti Devi

texts.en:
Gyanti, 37 years old, lives in the Balirampur Village Development Committee of Bara district with her husband and two children. Gyanti has a concrete mixer that is used to mix the sand and cement so that mixture can be used for constructing buildings. Both Gyanti and her husband are actively involved in this business. The family is making a good earning from this business. 

Gyanti has requested a loan amount of 40,000 NPR (Nepalese rupees) to buy another concrete mixing machine so that she can expand her business to meet the increasing demand in the area. She has used the money earned from the business for a quality education of her children. This business has helped her earn money and respect in the society. By expanding the business, she is hoping to catch the opportunity provided by the increasing house construction in that area.

loans.use: to pay for a concrete mixing machine.

loans.name: Arifrianus

texts.en:
Arifrianus, aged 34, is a father of two daughters: Bella, 6, is attending first grade in elementary school; and Ayu is 2 years old. Arifrianus has been running a kiosk business since 2011, and it helps him provide for his family. 

Two months ago, Arifrianus’ mother was attacked by a serious illness and he had to spend his money, including business capital, to cover his mother’s medical treatment. The situation made him unable to continue running his business as he had no more capital. But after being introduced to TLM by a loan officer, Arifrianus was impressed and interested in applying for a loan of 10,000,000 IDR (Indonesian rupiah) from TLM. He would like to purchase kiosk stuff such as a display window, mobile phone rechargers, instant noodles, sugar, coffee, tea, frying oil, snacks, etc. He is hoping that the loan assistance could positively impact his business and his income as well.

loans.use: to purchase kiosk stuff such as a display window, mobile phone rechargers, instant noodles, sugar, coffee, tea, frying oil, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Greseldo

texts.en:
Greseldo is married with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Greseldo is 31 years old, and two of her children are in school.

Greseldo has a food vending business in the Philippines. Greseldo requested a 23,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Greseldo has been in this business for one year. In the future, Greseldo would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Ginna Paola

texts.es: Ginna tiene 22 años vive con sus padres y su hermana menor su deseo mas grande es estudian por medi de su estudio mejorar su calidad de vida y brindarle a sus padres una ayuda para su futuro, ella tiene muchas metas junto con su familia y si continua estudiando todos los esfuerzos que realizaron sus familiares para darle su bachillerato no serian en vano. Ella quiere ser ejemplo de superacion para sus seres queridos y el dia de mañana puedan tener una mano amiga para confiar y seguir adelante ya que su hermana menor apenas esta en el colegio y ella quiere ser un gran ejemplo quiere que ella vea que estudiar es muy importante el futuro de toda la familia. Su sueño es mejorar cada dia y verse crecer de muchas maneras academica y laboralmente ella sabe que porn medio de su formaciòn en Campoalto va poder desarrollar diferentes competencias que le permitiran ubicarse laboralmente ella es una chica muy luchadora y esta muy dispuesta a dar todo siempre esta muy orientada tener buenos resultados, ella sabe que el camino no es facil pero tiene que ser fuerte para conseguir todo lo que quiere y llegar a las metas que tiene, quiere tener su propia casa tambien y mejorar la calidad de vida de muchas personas por medio de su profesion que inicia con la ayuda de este prestamo ella les da muchas gracias a las personas que leen su historia por tomarse el tiempo de conocer su historia y apoyarla en este prestamo de la misma forma espera gratificar el respaldo de todas las personas que lleguen apoyarla
texts.en:
Ginna is 22 years old; she lives with her parents and her younger sister. Her greatest wish is to get an education, and through her studies, to improve her quality of life and give her parents help in the future.

She has many goals, along with her family, and if she continues studying, all of the effort that her family members made in order for her to get her Bachelor’s degree will not be in vain. She wants to be an example of overcoming for her loved ones so that tomorrow, they can have a helping hand in order to trust and move ahead, since her younger sister is only in high school and she wants to be a good example. She wants her sister to see that getting an education is very important for the entire family’s future.

Her dream is to improve every day and to see herself grow in many ways, both academically and professionally. She knows that through her education in CampoAlto, she will be able to develop different skills that will allow her to find a job.

She is a girl who is a fighter, and she is always ready to give everything she has. She is very focused on getting good results; she knows that the path is not easy, but she has to be strong in order to achieve everything that she wants and reach the goals that she has set. 

She wants to have her own house, and also to improve the quality of life for many people by means of her career that she is beginning with the assistance from this loan. She is very thankful to the people who are reading her story for taking the time to know her story and support her in this loan. Likewise, she hopes to repay the backing from all of the people who support her.

loans.use: to begin her CampoAlto program in Pharmaceutical Services.

loans.name: Revelyn

texts.en:
Revelyn is married with three children. Revelyn is 39 years old and lives in Pan-ay, Clarin, Philippines.

Revelyn is a farmer and grows rice crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for six years. She has requested a loan to redeem her rice field.

Revelyn has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Revelyn hopes to financially support her immediate family members.

loans.use: to redeem her rice field

loans.name: Phema

texts.en:
Phema works hard to support her family. Phema is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Phema requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing net, paint, wood, etc for the repair of her fishing boat.

Phema has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Phema would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing net, paint, wood, etc to repair her fishing boat

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Emma works hard to support her family.

She has a restaurant business in the Philippines and earns additional income from raising pigs. Emma is borrowing PHP 19,500 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her restaurant business.

Emma has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Genalyn

texts.en: Genalyn, 27, works hard to provide for her family. She is engaged in a piggery business as a source of income. She has requested a PHP 7,000 loan to buy feed and vitamins. She is hoping for a higher income this time. Genalyn aspires to save enough money for the education of her three children and hopes to attain it soon through her hard work.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is 33 years old and an industrious mother. She is very enthusiastic to support her family through her fish-selling business. With this kind of occupation, she is able to provide for her family's basic necessities, but she is aiming for a higher way of living. This caused her to request a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy more fish to sell. She hopes to make her business more productive with her loan and to earn sufficient income for the improvement of her family’s living situation.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Mercedita

texts.en:
Mercedita is married with eight children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Mercedita is 49 years old. Four of her children are in school.

Mercedita has a fishing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy fishing net and other materials for fishing.

Mercedita has been in this business for 10 years. In the futre, Mercedita would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing net and other materials for fishing.

loans.name: Megeline

texts.en:
Megeline is 48 years old and married with one kid in school. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Megeline runs a variety store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell.

She has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, snack food, canned good and other groceries. 

In the future, Megeline would like to save enough to provide financial security for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Conception

texts.en:
Conception works hard to support her family. Conception is married and has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines.

Conception requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase materials for the maintenance of her fishing business.

Conception has been in this business for 25 years now.

In the future, Conception would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase materials for the maintenance of her fishing business

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en: Elsie is a 50-year-old fish vendor. She sells fresh and dried fish in the community.  Despite her age, she is working hard for the sake of her two children. She is always looking for a way to make a better living. Elsie is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to utilize in her business, specifically to buy more dried fish, which will improve and enhance her daily income.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to sell

loans.name: Weldemina

texts.en:
Weldemina is a 43-year-old woman who is married to Yermias, 47. Weldemina has been blessed with five children: Ferianto, 21, is attending university; Lady, 19, is working; Yosefina, 12, is attending first grade of junior high school; Angel, 5, is attending kindergarten; and Johanis, is 2 years old. 

Two years ago, Weldemina established a small business based at her home. She sells vegetable i.e. long beans, mustard greens, eggplant, squash, beans, etc to get extra income.  Weldemina sees that the availability of vegetable stock and other cooking spices is very limited and inadequate to meet customer’s needs. That is why she applied for a loan from TLM of 3,000,000 IDR to purchase additional cooking spices (white pepper, ginger, ginger plant, turmeric, salt, and cinnamon), and more vegetables. She is hoping that her income will increase with those things.

loans.use: to purchase cooking spices (white pepper, ginger, ginger plant, turmeric, salt, and cinnamon) and more vegetables.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 60 años esta casada desde hace 47 años con Hugo con quien tiene 7 hijos, ambos tiene una casa propia en donde viven junto a 2 de sus hijos. Rosa, tiene como trabajo la venta de comida. Prepara a diario los mas ricos desayunos y almuerzos que deleitan el paladar de sus clientes. Trabaja con la ayuda de su esposo quien se encarga de la atención durante las mañanas mientras que ella se dirige al mercado para comprar todo lo necesario para la preparación de los platillos del día siguiente. A su retorno del mercado, ayuda también con la atención al público, siempre de la mano con un trato agradable que es su mejor carta de presentación. Su puesto de trabajo está ubicado cerca a su hogar , frente a un hospital razón por la  cual siempre cuenta clientes . Lleva en este rubro más de 21 años y lo complementa con la venta de golosinas y frutas. 
Este trabajo le ha generado muy  buenas ganancias económicas razón por la cual esta muy satisfecha , pero también es conciente  que su clientela exige mucho en cuanto a sabor y comodidad . Es por eso que en esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 1000 soles para la compra de ingredientes al por mayor tales como arroz, aceite, azúcar y otros abarrotes que usa continuamente en su trabajo , y a su vez  comprará una mesa amplia y de buena calidad para sus clientes . Por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas y agradece la oportunidad brindada por MFP.
texts.en:
Rosa, 60, has been married to Hugo for 47 years and they have seven children.  They live in their own house with two of their children.  Rosa sells food for a living and prepares delicious breakfasts and lunches to the delight of her customers.  Her husband helps by attending to the stall in the morning while she goes to the market to buy all the necessary ingredients for her cooking.  When she gets back from the market she also attends to customers with kindness, which is her best letter of presentation.  Her business is located close to home and to the hospital, so she has a constant flow of customers.

Rosa has been in this business for 21 years and also sells sweets and fruit.  Since her job has generated a good profit, she is very satisfied, but also conscious of the fact that her clientele are very demanding in terms of flavor and comfort.  Therefore, she is requesting 1,000 PEN to buy wholesale ingredients such as rice, oil, sugar and other groceries that she uses constantly on the job.  She will also buy a bigger and better table for her customers.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time and is grateful for this opportunity from MFP.

loans.use: To buy cooking ingredients.

loans.name: Fatoumata's Group

texts.fr:
Mme ABIBATA est la représentante du groupe MANDE 2. ABIBATA se porte bien ainsi que tout le groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus  âgée 15ans et le moins âgée a 07ans. Tous  vont  à l’école et elle a 03 personnes à sa charge.
Mme vend des légumes depuis 02ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de  pissy .Ses clients sont les  hommes et femmes. Elle est très contente. 
Mme veut  s’acheter  01 sac de gombo sec ; 02 sacs de choux et 02 sacs d’aubergines et autres légumes sec.
Elle veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour  agrandir son hangar. Mme tient toujours ses ambitions qui sont  d’ouvrir une boutique de stockage pour les légumes et de scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Abibata is the leader of the MANDE 2 group.  She is doing well, and so are the other members of her group.  She is married and the mother of three children.  Her oldest child is 15, her youngest is 7.  All three attend school.  She has three people in her care.

Abibata has been selling vegetables for the past two years.  She stocks up at the Pissy market and sells to both men and women.  She is very happy.

Abibata wants to buy one bag of dry gumbo (okra), two bags of cabbage, two bags of eggplants and other dry vegetables.  She plans to use her profits to increase the size of her stall.  Her goals remain the same: she would like to open a warehouse to store her vegetables, and she wants to continue sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy one bag of dry gumbo (okra), two bags of cabbage, two bags of eggplants and other dry vegetables.

loans.name: Titolivio

texts.es: Titolivio, tiene la edad  de 63 años, está casado, vive con su hijo y esposa  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de otra en trabajos de asistencia para el café. Además de poder comprar unas plantas de almácigo para realizar resiembras a inicios de lluvia y así aumentar la densidad de plantas por área, además de aprovechar la buena fertilidad del suelo y las condiciones de clima y otras que favorecen al cultivo de café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Titolivio, 63, is married and lives with his wife and son, who are his top priority.  He plans to use the loan to buy fertilizers and fungicides and to hire workers to help with his coffee crop.
